00001 #include <iostream>
00002 using namespace std;
00003 
00004 #include "Clip.h"
00005 #include "Pixel.h"
00006 
00007 #include <Magick++.h>
00008 using namespace Magick;
00009 
00010 
00011 
00015 int main (int argc, char const *argv[])
00016 {
00017     try
00018     {
00019         // Load image form disk
00020         Image img(argv[1]);
00021         
00022         // Make a clip from the image
00023         Clip pressClip (img, 0, 0, img.rows(), img.columns());
00024         
00025         pressClip.colorspace(COLORSPACE_RGB);
00026         
00027         // Change the color of every pixel to red
00028         for (unsigned int i=0; i < pressClip.height(); ++i)
00029         {
00030             for (unsigned int j=0; j < pressClip.width(); ++j)
00031             {
00032                 Pixel p = pressClip.getPixel(i,j);
00033                 pressClip.setPixel(i, j, p.red(), p.green(), p.blue());
00034             }
00035         }
00036         
00037         // Write result to another file
00038         pressClip.image().write("test.png");
00039     }
00040     catch (exception& e)
00041     {
00042         cout << e.what() << endl;
00043         return 1;
00044     }
00045     catch (NessieException &error)
00046     {
00047         cout << error.what() << endl;
00048     }
00049     catch (...)
00050     {
00051         cout << "Unknown error" << endl;
00052     }
00053     return 0;
00054 }
